title: The Power of the Tongue
description: Words have played a vital role since the beginning of time. In the book of Genesis, God created the world and everything in it with His words. Today, as believers, we have that same God-like ability to speak those things which be not as though they are. Through God's Word, Kenneth Copeland reveals the Bible secret of words and the vital importance of using the tongue to create rather than destroy.
author: Kenneth Copeland
